subscribe_note: Friendly Reminder: Membership privileges are non-transferable and non-refunded.
purchase_note: Friendly Reminder: Purchased credits are non-transferable and non-refunded.
usage_note: Purchased credits are used for VisionY's AI-generated images and subsequent AI generation functions for other resources. Each image generation consumes approximately 10 credits based on computational power. You can check your remaining credits and usage history in your personal information.
membership_usage_note: Free credits are reset at the beginning of each month. Membership credits accumulate automatically each month. Credits are used for VisionY's AI-generated images and subsequent AI generation functions for other resources. Each image generation consumes approximately 10 credits based on computational power. You can check your remaining credits and usage history in your personal information.
credits_used_rules: Credits usage rules: Free credits are used first, followed by membership credits, and finally purchased credits.
amount_range_error: Please enter an amount between 10 and 10,000
register_login_to_experience: Log in to experience all product features
unregistered_user_login: Unregistered users will be automatically registered upon login
please_enter_correct_email_address: Please enter a valid email address
please_enter_correct_verification_code: Please enter the correct verification code
verification_code_sent: Verification code has been sent to your email
